cards.title: Shopping App
cards.desc: A simple shopping app that allows you to login, logout, adding products in your cart and also you can purchase.

cards.title: Multi Step Form
cards.desc: Multi step form for a gaming registration. Enter information and subscription details.

cards.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
cards.desc: A simple rock, paper, scissors game. I bet you can't beat me.

cards.title: IP Tracker
cards.desc: Project shows you your Ip informations by default. Enter any Ip to learn its informations.

cards.title: Hangman
cards.desc: A hangman game that I stole from youtube. I improved it little bit. Try to complete my campaign challenge.

cards.title: Music App
cards.desc: A simple music recommendation app that suggest you a music according to your mood that day.

cards.title: Aim Game
cards.desc: The logic of the game is to hit the most circles in the selected time. The radius of the circle varies according to selected game mode.

cards.title: Chat Application
cards.desc: It is an chat application that allows you to send message, reply message and create a new chat.

message.message2: Successfull! I am not going to receive that message tho, but thanks for your effort. <3
